ip_reveal.assets.sounds.alerts package¶

Module contents¶

ip_reveal.assets.sounds.alerts.ALERT_AUDIO_FP = '/home/taylor/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ip_reveal/assets/sounds/alerts'¶

The absolute filepath (as a string) containing all ‘alert’ sounds.

ip_reveal.assets.sounds.alerts.O_PULSE_FP = '/home/taylor/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ip_reveal/assets/sounds/alerts/o-pulse-alert.wav'¶

The absolute filepath (as a string) of the alert sound-file; ‘o_pulse’
